title: I did not study much in class 11. Is it fine to start studying now for IIT? - Quora
tags: Indian Institutes of Technology Academic and Educational Advice

response.answer_text: Well your success is not defined by what you didn't study but what you have studied and how much is it practiced ,thus making you eligible to get a good score in jee mains and advance.well as for the physics goes part 1 is based on newtonian mechanics ,fluid mechanics and heat so need to be troubled as it is no way related to part 2 (part 1 and part2 refers to hcv).Going with chemistry organics is related somewhat to the 11 th as it is quite related to what you will study in 12th so you have to revise them and you can easily learn the basics outright in 2 weeks at most.For inorganics go for ncert 12th it will fetch you good marks so no bothering for 11 as well here ,here as well no way it is related to 11th.(but keep making flashcards and notes of sizes and periodic table it helps in learing the major reactions and what and why's?)Lastly maths (was a nightmare ) not much related to 11 th go ahead with calculus and algebra which carries a pretty high weightage.
